title: BugSplat
body:
Every time I launch a league game I come to bugsplat at the loading screen. I've uninstalled, fixed corrupted files, did clean and hard resets, but nothing seems to work.

http://prntscr.com/dgodju
That's the bugsplat

replies.body: Bugsplats during loading is a sign that bad game files or drivers are failing to render the game.  I know you've tried a few things already, but I specifically recommend checking out the [game crash](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes+) guide to work towards a fix here.  Starting with your drivers!  Let me know if you have any questions.

Hello sir, I have a question. I would like to know why the fuck i get penalized if I get a bugsplat, then have to exit out of League because of it and when I restart, it says corrupt files and has to fix them. I have lost so much fucking LP because of this. You need to fix your game, the most popular game in the entire world. It should not have these problems.
I've tried all those solutions on that page and I still bugsplat

That sucks to hear, but I appreciate you trying!  Since the guide didn't help, grab some logs through the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can look into this with you individually to see what's happening.  We'll respond back asap!
happening to me too dw you are not alone. Exact same situation trying to connect to a match and im googling the same issue
